description: This file defines the Note entity class within a Java backend application, representing a note owned by a user. It uses Jakarta Persistence (JPA) annotations for ORM mapping and manages note properties such as title, content, timestamps, and owner reference.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class representing a personal note, with properties for id, title, content, timestamps, and owner, including ORM annotations and lifecycle methods.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Returns the owner (User) associated with the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets a new title for the note and updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets new content for the note and updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: setOwner
methods.description: Associates a new owner (User) with the note.

methods.name: preUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback method triggered before an entity update, updating the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: touch
methods.description: Updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp to the current Instant.
